content.question: The linear transformation function <math alttext="L"><mi>L</mi></math> is given by <math alttext="L open parentheses vector v close parentheses equals A times vector v"><mi>L</mi><mfenced><mover><mi>v</mi><mo>→</mo></mover></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mi>A</mi><mover><mi>v</mi><mo>→</mo></mover></math>, where <math alttext="A"><mi>A</mi></math> is a <math alttext="2 by 2"><mn>2</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>2</mn></math> matrix and <math alttext="vector v"><mover><mi>v</mi><mo>→</mo></mover></math> is a column vector. The linear transformation function <math alttext="K"><mi>K</mi></math> is given by <math alttext="K open parentheses vector v close parentheses equals B times vector v"><mi>K</mi><mfenced><mover><mi>v</mi><mo>→</mo></mover></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mi>B</mi><mover><mi>v</mi><mo>→</mo></mover></math>, where <math alttext="B"><mi>B</mi></math> is a <math alttext="2 by 2"><mn>2</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>2</mn></math> matrix and <math alttext="vector v"><mover><mi>v</mi><mo>→</mo></mover></math> is a column vector. If the composition function <math alttext="K open parentheses L open parentheses vector v close parentheses close parentheses equals C times vector v"><mi>K</mi><mfenced><mrow><mi>L</mi><mfenced><mover><mi>v</mi><mo>→</mo></mover></mfenced></mrow></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mi>C</mi><mover><mi>v</mi><mo>→</mo></mover></math> maps every vector to itself, which of the following describes <math alttext="A"><mi>A</mi></math> and <math alttext="B"><mi>B</mi></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="A"><mi>A</mi></math> and <math alttext="B"><mi>B</mi></math> must both be rotation matrices.
<math alttext="A"><mi>A</mi></math> and <math alttext="B"><mi>B</mi></math> must have the same determinant.
<math alttext="A"><mi>A</mi></math> and <math alttext="B"><mi>B</mi></math> must be inverses of each other.
<math alttext="A"><mi>A</mi></math> and <math alttext="B"><mi>B</mi></math> must both be the identity matrix.

content.answer: <math alttext="A"><mi>A</mi></math> and <math alttext="B"><mi>B</mi></math> must be inverses of each other.
